specificationConfigurations.name: DCC-RECOVERY
specificationConfigurations.description: A credential issued according to the EU Digital COVID Certificate specification that indicates a person's recovery from COVID-19.

classifierRule.name: Classifies a DCC recovery certificate based on the schema.

display.name: Display only minimum identity (name, date of birth)

rules.name: Check if recovery is from predefined disease
Check current date is within the covered dates for recovery
Check that there is only single record in certificate
Check the credential is not expired

trustLists.name: Trust all issuers registered in the EU Gateway

specificationConfigurations.name: DCC-TEST
specificationConfigurations.description: A credential issued according to the EU Digital COVID Certificate specification that indicates whether a person has completed a COVID-19 test.

classifierRule.name: Classifies a DCC test certificate based on the schema.

display.name: Display only minimum identity (name, date of birth)

rules.name: Check that duration since test is less then predefined value
Check for approved test
Check for negative test result
Check that there is only single record in certificate
Check the credential is not expired

trustLists.name: Trust all issuers registered in the EU Gateway

specificationConfigurations.name: DCC-VACCINATION
specificationConfigurations.description: A credential issued according to the EU Digital COVID Certificate specification that indicates a person's COVID-19 vaccination status.

classifierRule.name: Classifies a DCC vaccination certificate based on the schema.

display.name: Display only minimum identity (name, date of birth)

rules.name: Check that duration since getting the vaccination is in a predefined interval
Check for approved vaccine
Check that there is only single record in certificate
Check for completed vaccination cycle
Check the credential is not expired

trustLists.name: Trust all issuers registered in the EU Gateway

specificationConfigurations.name: SHC-VACCINATION
specificationConfigurations.description: A credential issued according to the SMART Health Card specification that indicates a person's COVID-19 vaccination status.

classifierRule.name: Classifies a SHC vaccination certificate based on the value in type field.

metrics.name: Counts verifications by result, issuer, type

display.name: Display only minimum identity (name, date of birth)

rules.name: Check for approved vaccine
rules.predicate: {"if": [{"var": "payload.vc.credentialSubject.fhirBundle"}, {"and": [{"in": [{"var": "payload.vc.credentialSubject.fhirBundle.entry.1.resource.vaccineCode.coding.0.code"}, {"var": "external.approvedVaccinesUS"}]}, {"if": [{"var": "payload.vc.credentialSubject.fhirBundle.entry.2.resource.vaccineCode.coding.0.code"}, {"in": [{"var": "payload.vc.credentialSubject.fhirBundle.entry.2.resource.vaccineCode.coding.0.code"}, {"var": "external.approvedVaccinesUS"}]}, true]}, {"if": [{"var": "payload.vc.credentialSubject.fhirBundle.entry.3.resource.vaccineCode.coding.0.code"}, {"in": [{"var": "payload.vc.credentialSubject.fhirBundle.entry.3.resource.vaccineCode.coding.0.code"}, {"var": "external.approvedVaccinesUS"}]}, true]}, {"if": [{"var": "payload.vc.credentialSubject.fhirBundle.entry.4.resource.vaccineCode.coding.0.code"}, {"in": [{"var": "payload.vc.credentialSubject.fhirBundle.entry.4.resource.vaccineCode.coding.0.code"}, {"var": "external.approvedVaccinesUS"}]}, true]}, {"if": [{"var": "payload.vc.credentialSubject.fhirBundle.entry.5.resource.vaccineCode.coding.0.code"}, {"in": [{"var": "payload.vc.credentialSubject.fhirBundle.entry.5.resource.vaccineCode.coding.0.code"}, {"var": "external.approvedVaccinesUS"}]}, true]}, {"if": [{"var": "payload.vc.credentialSubject.fhirBundle.entry.6.resource.vaccineCode.coding.0.code"}, {"in": [{"var": "payload.vc.credentialSubject.fhirBundle.entry.6.resource.vaccineCode.coding.0.code"}, {"var": "external.approvedVaccinesUS"}]}, true]}]}, false]}

rules.name: Check that duration since getting the vaccination is in a predefined interval
Check the credential is not expired

trustLists.name: Trust all issuers registered in the EU Gateway

valueSets.name: temperatureValidityDurationHours
valueSets.description: Number of hours since the temperature credential was issued within which is is valid

valueSets.name: normalTemperatureTresholdCelsius
valueSets.description: Treshold of normal temperature (C)

valueSets.name: normalTemperatureTresholdFahrenheit
valueSets.description: Treshold of normal temperature (F)

valueSets.name: acceptedPassStatus
valueSets.description: Accepted statuses of the issued pass credential

valueSets.name: passValidityDurationHours
valueSets.description: Number of hours since the pass was issued within which the pass valid

valueSets.name: approvedTests-ANTIGEN
valueSets.description: List of LOINC codes for ANTIGEN approved tests used for test verification

source.comments: ANTIGEN test LOINC codes retrieved from source (filtered using description)

queries.expression: [.compose.include[0].concept[] | select (.display | ascii_downcase | contains("immunoassay") or contains(" ab ")) | {"value": .code, "description": .display}]

items.description: SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) Ab panel - Serum, Plasma or Blood by Rapid immunoassay
SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) Ab panel - Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgG Ab [Presence] in Serum, Plasma or Blood by Rapid immunoassay
SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum, Plasma or Blood by Rapid immunoassay
SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgG+IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) Ag [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by Rapid immunoassay
SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgA Ab [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgG Ab [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) Ab [Interpretation] in Serum or Plasma
SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgG Ab [Presence] in DBS by Immunoassay
SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) Ab [Presence] in Serum or Plasma by Immunoassay
SARS-CoV+SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) Ag [Presence] in Respiratory specimen by Rapid immunoassay
SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgM Ab [Presence] in DBS by Immunoassay
SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgG+IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum, Plasma or Blood by Rapid immunoassay

valueSets.name: approvedVaccinesUS
valueSets.description: List of CDC CVX codes for approved vaccines used for vaccination verification

source.comments: Vaccine codes retrieved from source which have 'COVID-19' in ShortDescription field and with 'Active' or 'Non-Us' in Status field and does not have 'not counted toward  immunity in US' in Notes field and code not equal to 500

queries.expression: /CVXCodes/CVXInfo[contains(ShortDescription/text(), 'COVID-19') and (Status='Active' or Status='Non-US') and not(contains(normalize-space(Notes/text()), 'not counted toward immunity in US')) and normalize-space(CVXCode/text()) != '500']/CVXCode/text()

items.description: Spikevax (Moderna)
Comirnaty (Pfizer-BioNTech)
Vaxzevria (AstraZeneca)
Janssen
Comirnaty (Pfizer-BioNTech) 12 to 18 years
Comirnaty (Pfizer-BioNTech) 5 to 12 years
Comirnaty (Pfizer-BioNTech) 6 months to 5 years
Covaxin (Bharat Biotech)
Covilo/BIBP (Sinopharm)
CoronaVac (Sinovac)

valueSets.name: approvedVaccinesUSSingleDose
valueSets.description: List of CDC CVX codes for approved SINGLE DOSE vaccines used for vaccination verification

source.comments: Vaccine codes retrieved from source which have 'COVID-19' in ShortDescription field and with 'Active' or 'Non-Us' in Status field and does not have 'not counted toward immunity in US' in Notes field and contain '1-dose vaccine' in Notes field and code not equal to 500

queries.expression: /CVXCodes/CVXInfo[contains(ShortDescription/text(), 'COVID-19') and (Status='Active' or Status='Non-US') and not(contains(normalize-space(Notes/text()), 'not counted toward immunity in US')) and contains(Notes/text(), '1-dose vaccine') and normalize-space(CVXCode/text()) != '500']/CVXCode/text()

items.description: Janssen

queries.expression: [.compose.include[0].concept[] | select (.display | ascii_downcase | contains("naa") or contains("nucleic acid amplification") or contains("sequencing")) | {"value": .code, "description": .display}]

valueSets.name: requireBooster
valueSets.description: Indication whether a vaccination credential is checked for booster. Only booster vaccination is accepted if set to 'true'.

valueSets.name: vaccinationValidAfterDaysBOOSTER
valueSets.description: Number of days since the vaccination after which the vaccination is valid

valueSets.name: testValidityDurationHoursPCR
valueSets.description: Number of hours since the PCR test within which the test result is valid

valueSets.name: vaccinationValidityDurationDays
valueSets.description: The duration of the vaccination validity in days

valueSets.name: acceptedTestResults
valueSets.description: List of SNOMED codes for accepted test results indicating a negative COVID-19 test (virus not found)

items.description: Not detected
Not detected

valueSets.name: vaccinationValidityDurationDaysBOOSTER
valueSets.description: The duration of the vaccination validity in days

valueSets.name: vaccinationValidAfterDays
valueSets.description: Number of days since the vaccination after which the vaccination is valid

valueSets.name: testValidityDurationHoursANTIGEN
valueSets.description: Number of hours since the ANTIGEN test within which the test result is valid

valueSets.description: List of PRC LOINC codes for approved PCR test methods used for test verification

items.description: Nucleic acid amplification with probe detection

valueSets.description: List of SNOMED codes for approved diseases or agents indicating COVID-19 (for purpose of recovery certificate verification)

valueSets.description: List of LOINC codes for approved ANTIGEN test methods used for test verification

valueSets.name: requireExpirationDateField
valueSets.description: Indication whether expirationDate field is required. If set to 'true' and the field is not in credential then rule that checks the filed value returns FALSE.

valueSets.name: acceptTestMethodAsTestType
valueSets.description: Indication whether a test method (PCR or ANTIGEN) is accepted as test type. Only individual test codes are accepted if set to 'false'.
